ModMetaData.name: Better Pawn Control
ModMetaData.author: VouLT
ModMetaData.description:
Bulk assignment of animals to areas and colonists to outfits or drugs or restricted areas, in one single action. Setup different policies and switch at will.
Annoyed by manually having to set animals to safe area when raided? This mod can help you!
You wish to have different outfits policies by season or by incident? This mod can help you!
Enjoy :-)
Official forum thread: https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=26618.0
v1.6.5
